alert.note: Alert for Allen; Defiance; Fulton; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 13 at 10:30PM EDT until June 14 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 356 REMAINS VALID UNTIL MIDNIGHT EDT TONIGHT FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN INDIANA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 16 COUNTIES IN NORTHERN INDIANA ADAMS ALLEN IN BLACKFORD DE KALB ELKHART GRANT HUNTINGTON JAY KOSCIUSKO LAGRANGE MIAMI NOBLE STEUBEN WABASH WELLS WHITLEY IN MICHIGAN THIS WATCH INCLUDES 4 COUNTIES IN SOUTHWEST MICHIGAN BRANCH CASS MI HILLSDALE ST. JOSEPH MI IN OHIO THIS WATCH INCLUDES 8 COUNTIES IN NORTHWEST OHIO ALLEN OH DEFIANCE FULTON OH HENRY PAULDING PUTNAM VAN WERT WILLIAMS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBION, ANGOLA, ANTWERP, ARCHBOLD, AUBURN, BERNE, BLUFFTON, BLUFFTON, BRONSON, BRYAN, CASSOPOLIS, COLDWATER, COLUMBIA CITY, COLUMBUS GROVE, CONTINENTAL, DECATUR, DEFIANCE, DELTA, DESHLER, DOWAGIAC, DUNKIRK, EDGERTON, EDWARDSBURG, ELKHART, FORT WAYNE, FREMONT, GARRETT, GAS CITY, GOSHEN, GRISSOM AFD, HARTFORD CITY, HICKSVILLE, HILLSDALE, HUNTINGTON, JONESVILLE, KENDALLVILLE, LAGRANGE, LEIPSIC, LIBERTY CENTER, LIGONIER, LIMA, LITCHFIELD, MARCELLUS, MARION, MENDON, MENTONE, MEXICO, MONTPELIER, MONTPELIER, NAPOLEON, NAPPANEE, NEW HAVEN, NORTH MANCHESTER, OHIO CITY, OSSIAN, OTTAWA, PANDORA, PAULDING, PAYNE, PERU, PORTLAND, ROANOKE, SHERWOOD, SHIPSHEWANA, SOUTH WHITLEY, SPENCERVILLE, STURGIS, SWANTON, SYRACUSE, THREE RIVERS, TOPEKA, TRI-LAKES, UPLAND, VAN WERT, WABASH, WARSAW, WAUSEON, WHITE PIGEON, AND WINONA LAKE.
